name: Huuuge Dice
description:
Time to throw some REAL dice! We all know and love the classic, evergreen yatzy dice board game – HUUUGE Dice combines that fun with new, innovative and foremost best dice throwing experience you ever saw in an app. Simple classic one on one duels with either friends or ludicrous challengers, thinking they can beat you!

Play on the go or for hours in a row!

Choose between real player matchups and daily/weekly AI challenges – you choose your HUUUGE Dice play style as it suits you – binge dice throwing galore wherever it suits you!

------------ HUUUGE Dice Features -----------------

• Duel Mode: Look for opponents and choose the ante you are willing to bet on your victory!

• Challenge: Play the daily and weekly challenge for coins in our AI mode!

• Daily Roll: Quick addictive daily play, also to increase your coin count!

• Quick Play: Quick and direct action against a real player for 100 coins!

• Most thrilling dice throwing feel: Hands down, the most fun dice throw out there! Flip the dice or press the button and judge for yourself. Just like the real dice board game experience – only better!


Download HUUUGE Dice and start finger lickin' dice flickin' NOW!
